name: De'sign
overview: An entry level logic puzzle game where you have to build a displayed amount of pairs. Just choose a sign on the left side by clicking up and down on the joystick and on the right side by clicking left and right. If you've found a pair click fire and find out. Pairs must be in the flashing area. Pressing the button when you have not created a pair will lose a life. Time limits and move limits will quickly press you as well.
